rifle.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a long gun which you hold up to your shoulder to shoot
rifle.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to search a place or container quickly because you are looking for something, especially something to steal
rifle.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Sally rifled through her wardrobe looking for a dress.
The killer had rifled his wallet and stolen Â£200.
